title: Catalist Object Schema
description: A schema to add Catalist Network data to the Murmurations Index

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the group (e.g., our-group.org or some-host.org/our-group)

type.title: Group Type
type.description: The type of group (e.g., organization, project, community, non-profit, etc.)

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the group, project, organization, etc.

nickname.title: Nickname/Abbreviation
nickname.description: The nickname or abbreviation of the group, project, organization, etc.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the purpose and activities of the group or project

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords that describe the purpose and activities of the group or project, searchable in the Murmurations index

image.title: Logo Image
image.description: A logo or other image (starting with https:// or http://) representing the group, preferably a square or 4:3 ratio image

images.title: Other Images
images.description: Other images (starting with https:// or http://) representing the group

url.title: Main URL
url.description: A URL of the group or project starting with http:// or https://

status.title: Status
status.description: The current state of the group or project

starts_at.title: Start Date/Time
starts_at.description: The starting date and time for the group or project (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

ends_at.title: End Date/Time
ends_at.description: The ending date and time for the group or project (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

contact_details.title: Contact Details
contact_details.description: The contact details for the group or project (fill in at least one)

email.title: Email Address
email.description: The group's or project's contact email address

contact_form.title: Contact Form
contact_form.description: A webpage (starting with https:// or http://) with a contact form that can be used to reach the group/project

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the group or project

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: The geographic scope of the group's or project's activities

knows_language.title: Languages Spoken
knows_language.description: The languages a person can read, write and speak

exchange_type.title: Exchange Type
exchange_type.description: Are you offering ('selling') or wanting ('buying') something?
enumNames: Offer - I have something to lend, lease, sell or donate
Want - I want to borrow, rent, buy or receive something

transaction_type.title: Transaction Type
transaction_type.description: On what basis do you want to exchange the item?
enumNames: Borrow/Lend - I want to borrow or lend the item
Rent/Lease - I want to rent or lease the item
Buy/Sell - I want to buy or sell the item
Receive/Donate - I want to receive or donate the item

title.title: Title
title.description: The name of the group, project, organization, etc.

expires_at.title: Expires At
expires_at.description: The date and time (a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477) when this offer or want expires.

schema.name: catalist_object-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: A general object schema for Catalist Network
